page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The people have their entertainment in the Vicarage and in the Village Hall at Chevithorne. They also go into Tiverton. In Chevithorne, they have the Women's Institute once a month and sometimes twice a month when they want to talk about something important.They also have Mother's Union and Young Farmers meetings once a month. The ladies of Chevithorne go to the Youth Centre in Tiverton to Crochet Club.They sometimes have entertainment in the evening at the Village Hall. This might be Bingo or a get-together. Sometimes Coffee Mornings are arranged. Some people would rather entertain themselves and they paint, sew or knit and garden in their spare time. They also go for walks.
